    C

    Command - Class in net.vincent.CommuniDirect
    The Command class is a custom text field component that allows users to enter and execute textual commands within the CommuniDirect application.
    Command(CommuniDirect) - Constructor for class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.Command
    Constructs a Command input field and sets up its appearance and behavior.
    COMMAND - Enum constant in enum class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.EntryType
    Entry point for command execution logic.
    CommuniDirect - Class in net.vincent.CommuniDirect
    CommuniDirect is a simple Swing-based client-server communication tool.
    CommuniDirect() - Constructor for class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.CommuniDirect
    Initializes the CommuniDirect application.
    create() - Method in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.PropertiesData

    execCommand(String) - Method in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.Command

    K

    KeyHandler - Class in net.vincent.CommuniDirect
    KeyHandler is an ActionListener implementation that listens for command input events from the Command text field in the CommuniDirect application.
    KeyHandler(CommuniDirect) - Constructor for class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.KeyHandler
    Constructs a KeyHandler and associates it with the given CommuniDirect instance.

    L

    load() - Method in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.PropertiesData

    logClient(String) - Method in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.CommuniDirect
    Logs a client-related message.
    logServer(String) - Method in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.CommuniDirect

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.CommuniDirect
    Launches the CommuniDirect application on the Swing event dispatch thread.
    maxLogLines - Static variable in class net.vincent.CommuniDirect.CommuniDirect
